description: A man who died in a crash on the Isle of Man was almost three times over the drink-drive limit, inquest told.
title: Death crash biker almost three times over limit on Isle of Man
title_page: Death crash biker almost three times over limit on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: The post-mortem also found evidence of heart disease and the inquest heard that Mr Nally had seen a doctor about dizzy spells, which Ms Hughes said may have contributed to the accident.
